item.title: Halfway through Demo
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Newsarama has an interview with Brian Wood about Demo reaching it's halfway point, his thoughts on the previous six issues as well as information and art on the next 6. I have repeated this time and time again, check this series out! Demo is great stuff! (Link courtesy of Thought Balloons)
